Description: Granite relief showing the god Hermes. Archaising style.
Curator's comments: Copies the style of Athenian work of the later 6th century BC, or rather early 5th c. BC.
Bibliographic references: Sculpture / Catalogue of Greek Sculpture in the British Museum (2205)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Richard Grenville, 2nd Duke of Buckingham and Chandos (sale)
